summary: Nifs from my dragon Kalameet model - skleleton, mesh+skeleton and mesh only.
descriptionHtml:
Yeah, so I modeled a dragon, but now I have no idea what to do with the nifs to get them to load in game. But I did make progress - at first, the nifs loaded in the creation kit as an exclamation point, now it's invisible. I think this has something to do with the texture paths (or something), as opposed to the settings in nifskope being wrong.

If somebody can fix these so they load, I would appreciate it, because I don't know what do change.

I need help, people!
author: SheWolfSpirit
